alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:15PM CDT until August 13 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LIPSCOMB...NORTHEASTERN WHEELER...EAST CENTRAL ROBERTS AND HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 614 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Lipscomb to 4 miles southwest of Canadian, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Canadian, Higgins, Allison, Glazier, and Lake Marvin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
